Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Oval, Parallelogram, Rectangle, Rhombus, Square, Trapezoid, Triangle

    abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    This is the abstract class for Shape
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wesley Kim
